title: Crime Alert 02.07.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 02.07.19
description:
The male nurse accused of sexually assaulting and impregnating a severely disabled woman pleads not guilty. In Connecticut, a woman's body is found stuffed inside a suitcase - her hands and feet bound. 67-year-old man gets a light 6 year sentence after paying two teen girls for sex. Judge calls the victims “aggressors. ”

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
